name: hypnotic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
caused by hypnosis: hypnotic trance She went into a hypnotic trance.
making you feel as if you want to sleep or are in a trance (= a state of not being completely conscious or in control of yourself): The beat of the music was strangely hypnotic.
